title: Pixel 5 stops wireless charging in the middle of the night after the last update.
content:
Since the last update my Pixel 5 suddenly stops charging in the middle of the night. Sometime I wake up with just 52%. 

It shows as if it's being charged but actually isn't receiving any "juice".

In my car wireless charger, both from Xiaomi, it stops charging after 1 minute. It's not a problem of the chargers. 

Fix this ASAP, please! It's really annoying.
